title: Question about tournaments
body: I run a gaming community, and hoping to host events and tournaments. It will be organized and run by me and my staff members (mods). Planning on 1v1 tournaments/ team tournaments. I'm wondering is there any special permission to run a tournament, if so who do I talk to. I'm hoping to get more people to join and get involved and have fun. Ill write out specialized rules (No toxicity since I changed my behavior and not toxic anymore)

replies.body: We've actually got a special website to help with running these special events! Head on over to our [**Community Events**](https://events.na.leagueoflegends.com/) page and let me know if you have any other questions along the way! ^_^
